title: Dungeon Fighter Live Fall Of Hendon Myre XBLA XBOX360-MoNGoLS
description:
!!!JTAG / RGH MODDED CONSOLES ONLY!!!

Dungeon Fighter Live Fall Of Hendon Myre XBLA XBOX360-MoNGoLS

The long awaited hack-and-slash action and 2D side scrolling multiplayer mania in Dungeon 
Fighter LIVE: Fall of Hendon Myre arrives July 13th!  Players will have the option to 
choose from three classic Dungeon Fighters rolesÃ¢â‚¬â€Slayer, Gunner, and FighterÃ¢â‚¬â€to defend 
Hendon Myre from monsters spreading Phantasmalia. Customize your heroes by creating 
and enhancing gear, and deliver unique attacks by chaining and combining skills, 
all while playing with up to 4 players on the same console or via Xbox LIVE!

Unique Dungeons and Legions of Monsters: Each dungeon you explore offers unique challenges 
and requires a different strategy.The deeper you delve into the dungeons, the more monsters 
youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to defeat.

Hundreds of Items: Create and enchant items to defeat stronger enemies and collect even 
more items! Trade items with other players for more customization options, and to help 
a fellow fighter, of course.

Story-Based Campaign: Delivered in dynamic comic style, this dramatic storyline will 
drive your Dungeon Fighter to the limit!

New HD Graphics: See the world of the Dungeon Fighter like you never have before.
